meanings.definition: A major group of animals that includes vertebrates and some invertebrates, characterized by the development of the anus before the mouth during embryonic development.
meanings.sent1: Deuterostomes are animals with the anus forming before the mouth.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study deuterostomes to learn about different animal groups.
meanings.sent3: The deuterostomes had a party where the food went in the wrong way!
meanings.sent4: In the world of deuterostomes, the backdoor opens before the front door.
meanings.sent5: Imagine deuterostomes as creatures that start with the end first!

meanings.definition: Animals belonging to the deuterostome group.
meanings.sent1: Many deuterostomes live in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: The zoo has a special exhibit featuring deuterostomes.
meanings.sent3: The deuterostomes organized a parade to celebrate their group.
meanings.sent4: In the forest, the deuterostomes are like a secret society.
meanings.sent5: Children love learning about deuterostomes at the museum.
